long_description: The women's REI Endeavor Shirt is high-performance trail wear that lets you push the pace and extend your mileage. Nylon/spandex fabric is lightweight, flexible, moisture-wicking and quick-drying to keep you cool and comfortable on the trail. Flexible knit side panels extend your range of motion. UPF 50+ fabric rating provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Mesh vent at back yoke enhances breathability. Snap tabs for rolled-up sleeves let you adjust your warmth and coverage. Seams are placed to prevent chafing under pack straps. Snap chest pocket and zip sleeve pocket provide secure storage for essentials. The women's REI Endeavor shirt has a performance fit that moves with you.
short_description: The women's REI Endeavor Shirt is high-performance trail wear that lets you push the pace and extend your mileage.
